summary: A retexture of the Surilie Wine and Argonian Bloodwine. Also recently added Tamika 399, Tamika 415, Tamika West Weald and Shadow Banish.
descriptionHtml:
A retexture of the Surilie Wine and Argonian Bloodwine. Also recently added Tamika 399, Tamika 415, Tamika West Weald and Shadow Banish.

If you like this file you may also like my Riften Specials retexture at http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/41594//?

Requirements
============
Hearthfire.esm

Alternate Download Available under Optional files
===========================================
An alternate file for [color=red]Realistic Needs and Diseases[/color] by perseid9 (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26228/?)

A patch file for use with [color=red]iNeed[/color] by isoku (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51473/?)

Load Order
=========
After any mods that alters the Surilie or Argonian bottles.

Details
=======
Due to the way these bottles are rendered in the nif files simply adding labels was not an option (...for me). I had to do a complete recolor for the labels to appear correctly. These are the files I have been using. Hope you like....

Install
=======
1. Allow NMM to install (recommended)
-or-
2. Unpack and drop the Surilie And Argonian Wine .ESP and .BSA files into your SkyrimData folder.

Uninstall
=========
1. Allow NMM to uninstall (recommended)
-or-
2. Delete the Surilie And Argonian Wine .ESP and .BSA files from your SkyrimData folder. Done.


History
=======
2.0 2014/05/08 - Add more wines.
1.0a 2013/09/06 - Initial release.

You can do whatever you want with this mod but all I ask in return is that you give me credit if you distribute any part of this mod. I would also like to know what mods are including my work.
